suite.name: Keywords

test.name: Práctica Uno

kw.name: Cargar Navegador
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: F_foto_pagina
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Captura una captura de pantalla de toda la página con nombre personalizado.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Abre el navegador, maximiza la ventana y toma una captura inicial de la página.

kw.name: Validar Nombre
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Verifica visibilidad del campo nombre y lo llena con el valor definido.

kw.name: Validar Correo
F_texto
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Espera a que el elemento sea visible y escribe el texto indicado.
Llena el campo de correo usando un keyword reutilizable.

kw.name: Cargar Direcciones
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dirección uno' into text field 'id=currentAddress'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dirección dos' into text field 'id=permanentAddress'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: F_foto_selector
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.
Captura una imagen del elemento indicado, verificando visibilidad y disponibilidad.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0, 200) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Llena los campos de dirección actual y permanente, y toma capturas.

kw.name: Enviar Información
Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: F_foto_pagina
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Captura una captura de pantalla de toda la página con nombre personalizado.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Captura pantalla final, oculta anuncio y envía el formulario.

kw.name: Cerrar Navegador
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Cierra el navegador al finalizar el test.

test.doc: Caso de prueba que automatiza el formulario de DEMOQA utilizando keywords personalizados.

suite.doc: Práctica de uso de Keywords personalizados para automatizar el formulario de DEMOQA.
